name: Ju-on: The Grudge
description:
JU-ON: The Grudge is a “Haunted House Simulator” where accessibility and
instant scares are given priority over everything else. Using the Wii
Remote as a flashlight, explore haunted areas such as an abandoned
warehouse, a dimly-lit hospital, and a mannequin factory. Much like a
haunted house, you must proceed forward even after being frightened.
